content: in next ch2 space double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet* repeat from * to * 7 times shell in next ch2 space double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet join with slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 slip_stitch in next double_crochet 8 shells 48 double_crochet round 7 ch3 double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet *shell in next ch2 space double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet* repeat from * to * 7 times shell in next ch2 space double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet join with slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 slip_stitch in next double_crochet 8 shells 64 double_crochet if you would like to make a smaller dishcloth continue on to rnds 9-10 and work the amount of stitches in the parenthesis round 8 ch3 double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet *shell in next ch2 space double_crochet in next 5 double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next 5 double_crochet* repeat from * to * 7 times shell in next ch2 space double_crochet in next 5 double_crochet join with slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 slip_stitch in next double_crochet 8 shells 80 double_crochet round 9 ch1 single_crochet in same st as slip_stitch and in next 5 4 double_crochet *3 single_crochet in next ch2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 6 5 double_crochet decrease over next 2 double_crochet single_crochet in next 6 5 double_crochet* repeat from * to * 7 times single_crochet in next ch2 space 3 times single_crochet in next 6 5 double_crochet decrease over next 2 sts in the next double_crochet and in the next slip_stitch join with slip_stitch in top of first single_crochet 8 decrease 120 single_crochet -104 single_crochet if making smaller dish cloth round 10 ch1 single_crochet in same st as slip_stitch and in next 6 5 single_crochet *3 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 7 6 single_crochet slip_stitch in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 7 6 single_crochet* repeat from * to * 7 times single_crochet in next single_crochet 3 times single_crochet in next 7 6 single_crochet slip_stitch in next single_crochet join with slip_stitch in top of first single_crochet 8 sl sts - not including very last slip_stitch at end of round 136 single_crochet- 120 single_crochet if making small dish cloth fasten_off and weave in ends securely with tapestry needle this pattern is copyrighted to julee reeves august 2009 pattern is for personal gifts and that sort of thing and charity use only if you would like to sell the finished item please contact me for permission if permission to sell the finished item is granted it may not be sold online only at craft fairs farmers markets etc and it may not be sold in idaho or montana without my express permission thank you julee reeves j r designs *page 3*
